parameters.name: -all
parameters.description: List all containers, including stopped ones.

parameters.name: -created
parameters.description: Add the container's created time to the output.

parameters.name: -runningFor
parameters.description: Add the container's running time to the output.

parameters.name: -ports
parameters.description: Add the container's ports to the output.

parameters.name: -mounts
parameters.description: Add the container's mounts to the output.

parameters.name: -size
parameters.description: Add the container's size to the output.

parameters.name: -image
parameters.description: Add the container's image to the output.

parameters.name: -command
parameters.description: Add the container's command to the output.

parameters.name: container
parameters.description: The ID or name of the container to inspect.

parameters.name: -size
parameters.description: Add the container's file size to the output.

parameters.name: container
parameters.description: The ID or name of the container for which to show logs.

parameters.name: container
parameters.description: The ID or name of the container for which to show stats.

parameters.name: container
parameters.description: The ID or name of the container to be deleted.

parameters.name: -size
parameters.description: Add the image's size to the output.

parameters.name: -digest
parameters.description: Add the image's digest to the output.

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: The ID or name of the image to inspect.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: The project to build an image for.

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: The environment to build an image for.

parameters.name: -push
parameters.description: Whether to push the image after building it.

parameters.name: -remove
parameters.description: Whether to remove the image after pushing it.

parameters.name: -noCache
parameters.description: Whether to ignore cached images when building.

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: The image to be saved.

parameters.name: outputFile
parameters.description: The file to save the image archive in.

parameters.name: imageFile
parameters.description: The image archive file to load.

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: The ID or name of the image to be deleted.

parameters.name: -scope
parameters.description: Add the volume's scope to the output.

parameters.name: -mountPoint
parameters.description: Add the volume's mount point to the output.

parameters.name: volume
parameters.description: The name of the volume to inspect.

parameters.name: volume
parameters.description: The name of the volume to be deleted.

parameters.name: container
parameters.description: The ID or name of the container to open a shell in.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Which project to docker-compose.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Which direction to docker-compose.
